duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic and therapeutic procedures as ordered by a physician.
Administer medical gas and aerosol therapy, obtain and analyze blood specimens, and operate respiratory and cardiopulmonary equipment.
Provide mechanical ventilation, maintain artificial airways, and assist with cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
Conduct patient education, monitor equipment and patient response, and complete documentation of in-patient records.
Clean equipment, maintain safety and infection control practices, and comply with all regulatory requirements.

education_certification.credential: Associates or Bachelors in Respiratory Therapy from an accredited program
Current Respiratory Therapist license from the State Board for Respiratory Care
Basic and Advanced Cardiac Life Support certifications
